name: Dominance of Earth
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Zhongli, equip this card.
After Zhongli equips this card, immediately use Dominus Lapidis: Striking Stone once.
When your active character is protected by a Shield Character Status or a Shield Combat Status, your Summons deal +1 Geo DMG.
(You must have Zhongli in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1603]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1603] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S16033]</color> once.
When your active character is protected by a $[K6] Character Status or a $[K6] Combat Status, your Summons deal +1 $[K106].
(You must have $[A1603] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Zhongli</color>, equip this card.
After Zhongli equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Dominus Lapidis: Striking Stone</color> once.
When your active character is protected by a {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> Character Status or a {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> Combat Status, your Summons deal +1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>.
(You must have Zhongli in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: The vastness of rivers flows endless, perpetual upon the tapestry of eons.
source: Reward for inviting Zhongli to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
